results.title: Biomarkers of frailty.
results.text_hl: Intervention to treat @<m>DISEASE_Frailty</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000073496 @@@frailty@@@, including non-pharmacological ones, especially those involving physical exercise and nutrition, and pharmacological interventions, that include those targeting specific mechanisms such as myostatin inhibitors, @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@ sensitizer @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and with special relevance for hormonal treatments are mentioned.

results.title: The Use of Metformin to Increase the Human Healthspan.
results.text_hl: Growing amounts of evidence from clinical trials suggest that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ can effectively reduce the risk of many @DISEASE_Osteoporosis @DISEASE_MESH:D010024 @@@age-related diseases@@@ and conditions, including @DISEASE_Metabolic_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D024821 @@@cardiometabolic disorders@@@, @DISEASE_Neurodegenerative_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D019636 @@@neurodegeneration@@@, @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@chronic inflammation@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Frailty</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000073496 @@@frailty@@@.
